context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: seek financial help from various sources to afford the medication

approach various organizations or foundations that help with medical costs

appeal to the insurance company for an exception or look for programs that assist with the cost of prescription drugs
seek financial help from friends, family, or community organizations
take out a loan or explore financial aid options through the hospital
seek financial aid from government programs, charities, or pharmaceutical companies that could help cover the cost of the medication
seek help from friends, family, or community fundraisers

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: quickly call or text her mom to bring her homework to school if she's able to
call or message her mom to bring the assignment to school if possible
contact her mother and ask if it would be possible for her to bring the homework to school before her class
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could submit the assignment the following day or if she could email a picture or scan of the assignment once she gets home
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension

contact her teacher or professor, explain the situation, and request for an extension or allow her to submit the assignment electronically, if possible

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start rationing the remaining food and water supplies
build a shelter from branches, leaves, or snow to protect them from the cold weather and wind
start rationing the remaining food and water to last as long as possible
build a fire for warmth, using twigs, leaves, and other dry materials they find in the environment
start a fire to keep warm and simultaneously signal for help
start a fire for warmth and signal for help, collect snow to melt for drinking water, and ration whatever food they have left
start a fire to keep warm and attempt to send smoke signals to attract the attention of any potential rescuers in the area
start a fire for warmth and to signal for help
start a fire to keep them warm, signal for help and potentially cook any food they may find
start building a shelter to protect against the cold
